short: Exports data set(s) out of the repository
name: export
synopsis: data-repository export [--id <identifier>] [--name <name>] [--text <text snippet>] [--before <time stamp>] [--after <time stamp>] [--verbose] <repository path> [<data set identifier>] <destination folder>

params.--text <text snippet>: Text contained in name or description.

params.--before <time stamp>: Time stamp in the format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

params.--after <time stamp>: Time stamp in the format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

params.--verbose: Shows progress information in case of copying mode. The number of bytes already copied versus the total number of bytes to be copied will be shown.

params.<repository path>: Absolute or relative path to the repository.

params.<data set identifier>: Identifier of the data set to be deleted. This parameter has to appear if no option has been specified. If an option has been specified it is not allowed.
